cause.description:
Please take a moment ... and ask yourself are there any mexicans i know? and do they need help?
The answer is yes there MEXICAN!! We live on hand-outs :D
1. People thibk were slimmy cause our bad facial hair its not true
2. We dont all eat at Taco-Bell !!
3. SOme of us are taller then 5'4
cause.mission: To Support and help in anyway a Mexican
cause.name: Support A Mexican
